details.old_behavior: Documentation states the default level is 'debug'

details.old_behavior: Documentation states the default json value is false
details.new_behavior: Code sets default json to true (line 14: const json = options?.json ?? true)

details.old_behavior: Documentation describes level as generic 'string' type
details.new_behavior: Code defines level as union type: "info" | "warn" | "error" (interface LoggerOptions, line 4)
